doc:
Terrence Mann https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terrence_Mann 0 Terrence Vaughan Mann (born July 1, 1951) is an American actor, theatre director, and singer. He is chiefly known for his prominent appearances on the Broadway stage for the past three decades, including leading roles in the original Broadway casts of Barnum, Cats, Les Miserables, and Beauty and the Beast. He is a distinguished professor in musical theater at Western Carolina University in Cullowhee, North Carolina. In cinema he is best known for portraying the bounty hunter Ug in the Critters film series and Larry in A Chorus Line. He stars as the villain Whispers in the Netflix series Sense8. Terrence_Vaughan_Mann ( born July_1_,_1951 ) is an_American_actor , theatre_director , and singer . He is_chiefly_known for his_prominent_appearances on the_Broadway_stage for the_past_three_decades , including leading roles in the_original_Broadway_casts of Barnum , Cats , Les_Miserables , and Beauty and the_Beast . He is a_distinguished_professor in musical_theater at Western_Carolina_University in Cullowhee , North_Carolina . In cinema he is_best_known for portraying the_bounty_hunter_Ug in the_Critters_film_series and Larry in A_Chorus_Line . He stars as the_villain Whispers in the_Netflix_series_Sense8 .
